Filter Date.description: Displays the date given a format string. The string 'Now' can be used for the current date/time.

Filter Date ISO.description: Displays the date given a format string. The string 'Now' can be used for the current date/time.

Assign Date Now.description: Assigns current date time to now.

Filter Date Now.description: Displays the date given a format string. The string 'Now' can be used for the current date/time.

Filter Date DateAdd.description: Adds a span of time to a provided date (default is in days).

Filter Date DateDiff.description: Takes two datetimes and returns the difference in the unit you provide. You can provide the value 'Now' for either the start or end date.

Filter Date DatesFromICal.description: Returns a list of upcoming dates from an iCal string or List of iCal strings.

Filter Date DaysFromNow.description: Returns a humanized string of the number of days from now without concern for time.

Filter Date DaysInMonth.description: Returns the number of days in the month you provide.

Filter Date DaysSince.description: Returns the number of days from now.

Filter Date DaysUntil.description: Returns the number of days from now.

Filter Date HumanizeDateTime.description: Compares the provided date/time to the current date/time and returns a human friendly string like 'yesterday' or '2 hours ago'.

Filter Date HumanizeTimeSpan.description: Takes two datetimes and humanizes the difference like '1 day'. Supports 'Now' in either the start or end date.

Filter Date NextDayOfTheWeek.description: Advances the date to a specific day in the next 7 days.

Filter Date SundayDate.description: Returns the Sunday date portion (without any time portion) of the date provided.

Filter Date ToMidnight.description: Sets the time to midnight for a specific day.
